sense.def:
To govern a country
pomeni vladati neki deželi, na primer s sprejemanjem in spreminjanjem zakonov, vodenjem gospodarstva in nadzorom javnih služb.

seg.quote: Many civil servants are sure that they can govern better than the politicians.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
governs an event or situation
, ima nadzor nad nekim dogodkom ali okoliščinami in nanje vpliva.
